articles.title: Fastest and slowest planets in the Solar System - The Times of India
articles.description: ​The Solar System showcases a fascinating range of speeds among its planets, from swift orbiters to leisurely wanderers, each moving at its unique pace through the cosmos.
articles.content: Earth, our home planet, travels through space at an average speed, taking 365 days to complete its orbit around the Sun, balancing between rapid and leisurely celestial movements.
